snippet: Rafael Nadal is convinced that none of his rivals are taking performance-enhancing drugs and believes that people who have accused him of doping have "personal problems"....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal is convinced that none of his rivals are taking performance-enhancing drugs and believes that people who have accused him of doping have "personal problems".

headline.print_headline: Nadal Hits Out at Doping Accusers, Says Rivals Are 'Totally Clean'
headline.main: Nadal Hits Out at Doping Accusers, Says Rivals Are 'Totally Clean'
